timeline.bodyText: I wonder if we're getting to the point of needing to have all user-visible strings in the bundle.
timeline.author: stevemessick

replies.bodyText:
That's likely a useful change to make.
I wonder what tools JetBrains has for this? Are there lints we can enable? Is there a way to know how many non-localized strings we currently have?
replies.author: devoncarew
